content.rendered:
Roadtrips Special Statement regarding the EURO 2020 Postponement

UEFA has decided to postpone the EURO 2020 tournament by one year due to the Coronavirus Covid-19 and a concern for public health. The new dates announced are June 11 – July 11, 2021.

Custom VIP Euro 2021 Travel Packages

Experience one of soccer’s biggest events your way. Our 2021 UEFA Euro packages are customizable, so you can get the most out of your experience. Choose your preferred matches, Follow Your Team, or be there to witness the Semi-finals and Euro 2021 Final. Personalize your Euro experience with your choice of first-class accommodations, your preferred tickets, private airport transfers, and more.

The UEFA European Championship, as its more formally known, takes place just once every four years and is always highly anticipated by soccer fans in Europe and around the world. Euro 2021 will make history as it will be held in 12 cities in 12 different countries for the first time. The tournament will also be commemorating its 60th anniversary and you can be sure all 12 host cities will be ready to celebrate, especially London which will host both semi-finals and the championship final. With bragging rights and a berth in the Confederations Cup on the line, the soccer will be incredible and the atmosphere even more so.

Complete 2021 UEFA Euro packages available from $4,095 per person (Follow Your Team Package) and from $14,935 per person (Semi-Finals & Final Package), based on double occupancy.
